==== Sekilas Ubuntu-Id Metro a.k.a Ubuntu Metro ====

 Ubuntu Metro merupakan gabungan komunitas pengguna Ubuntu di wilayah Jabodetabek, 
 Ubuntu Metro merupakan Event Organizer kegiatan Ubuntuers Jabodetabek

==== Ubuntu Metro Roadmap ====
* KopDar Rutin Bulanan, Setiap Minggu ke-2 setiap bulan, tempat : Jabodetabek
* Special Event : Release Party, Community Gathering, Road to School
* Install Fest @ Mall Jabodetabek
* Open Source Futsal Community Competition
* IT Local Branded Industrial Partner
* Ubuntu Professional Support
